name: deep madness (itch)
description:
deep madness sends you into the eternal abyss. But is there perhaps an end? Try your luck and reach the secret end. :D

I developed deep madness alone during Ludum Dare 48. Unfortunately I started with the project a bit later. Therefore, one or the other problems may still arise that I would still have to optimize. But the time was too short. It is at least playable.

Key Bindings:
Space or Left Click for drop down. ;)
NOTE: Please play in Fullscreen. :)

And play please in Fullscreen. :P

I wish you a lot of fun while playing. 

Share your Higscore with pleasure. also via twitter with #deepmadness ;)

*whisper*

It was an awesome jam though. :)
